Web & Mobile App Development

professional web and mobile applications, content management systems, and data security.

About Me

Who I Am

Hello, my name is Leo. I am an electrical engineer turned software developer. I began my career as a network administrator designing backend software for database deployment, backup integrity, and security management. I continued my education in various fields of web development and heavily rely on JavaScript and Python. Today, my skillset widely ranges from web and mobile applications, WordPress themes, database integration, and API design. Outside of web development, I enjoy playing guitar, taking dance classes, exercising, and being a part of the local startup community.

My Services

Static Website Design
Using the latest technologies in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create responsive material design websites to fit any screen size.
Single Page Applications
Real time mobile and desktop applications integrated with 3rd party or custom built APIs for dynamically updated data access.
Android and iOS Hybrid Applications
Android and iOS mobile application development for your new idea or involvement in the growing field of mobile app integration.
Content Management Systems
Standalone or integrated WordPress CMS so you can easily create, update, or delete the content of your website without writing code.

Design Process

Each project follows a strict design process of information gathering, prototyping, testing, and deployment into a production environment.

Design and Plan
This involves collecting data about your business model, your competitors, and what direction you want your business to grow. Mock up designs and planning strategy to ensure smooth development.
Develop and Test
Wireframes, color themes, typography, and material design for front end construction. Speed, scalability, and data integrity for the back end. Thorough testing throughout the development process.
Deploy and Maintain
From planning to deployment, your product can be seamlessly integrated into your business to fit your needs. Added technical support for those last minute changes to guarantee product stability and satisfation.
